name: Limp Wrist
tagline: Just where have we been anyways?
body:
I'm creating a database and map of of all the concerts Limp Wrist has ever played since our first show in 1999. This map is hosted on Cartodb and synched to my Google database, and will eventually contain a photo in each info-window headers. More info about Limp Wrist is available on our bandcamp site. 


<iframe width="100%" height="520" frameborder="0" src="https://andrewmartini.cartodb.com/viz/dc7ee17e-3163-11e5-8946-0e4fddd5de28/embed_map" allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen oallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen></iframe>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
